mapper.sql: QUA_ID, INDENT_ID, PURC_ID, QUA_SREIAL, QUA_QC, QUA_GOOD, QUA_BAB, QUA_ISVA, ISVA, CREATER, CREATETIME, REMARK
mapper.select: select QUA_SREIAL from erp_quality where QUA_SREIAL like concat(concat('%', #{date}), '%') ORDER BY CREATETIME DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert:
insert into erp_quality
QUA_ID,
INDENT_ID,
PURC_ID,
QUA_SREIAL,
QUA_QC,
QUA_GOOD,
QUA_BAB,
QUA_ISVA,
ISVA,
CREATER,
CREATETIME,
REMARK,

#{quaSreial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{quaQc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update erp_quality
INDENT_ID = #{indentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURC_ID = #{purcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUA_SREIAL = #{quaSreial,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUA_QC = #{quaQc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUA_GOOD = #{quaGood,jdbcType=INTEGER},
QUA_BAB = #{quaBab,jdbcType=INTEGER},
QUA_ISVA = #{quaIsva,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ISVA = #{isva,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where QUA_ID = #{quaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update erp_quality set INDENT_ID = #{indentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURC_ID = #{purcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUA_SREIAL = #{quaSreial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUA_QC = #{quaQc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUA_GOOD = #{quaGood,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QUA_BAB = #{quaBab,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QUA_ISVA = #{quaIsva,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ISVA = #{isva,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where QUA_ID = #{quaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
